promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare gorilla fighting-type pokemon holding a ornate hammer. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or gorilla. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Hammiback, a a chibi cute rare gorilla fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Water Slash. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gorilla", "fighting" or "Hammiback". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, gorilla-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Shy by nature, this rare creature uses its Water Slash ability to cut down canyon vegetation for nourishment. An adorably small, formidable foe!
